name: iTouchless Fully-Automatic Touchless 23-Gallon Trash Can NX, Stainless Steel
categoryPath: Home/Kitchen & Dining/Kitchen Storage & Organization/Trash Cans & Recycle Bins

reviews.name: iTouchless Fully-Automatic Touchless 23-Gallon Trash Can NX, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: WE love this at first. Then 6 mths down the road it stop. The lid doesn't lift unless we do it by hand. The size of the can is great but it just stopped working. Now I can't return it for another because it's past the 3 mth return policy.
reviews.title: Love it,BUT!

reviews.name: iTouchless Fully-Automatic Touchless 23-Gallon Trash Can NX, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: I love this trash can. I looked for months for a large stainless steel trash can for the kitchen and this is it. It works great,looks greast and keeps the smell inside the can. Does go off sometimes if you walk to close to it but not a problem for me. Plus my kids love throwing things away now. Great trash can for the home especiallyif you have a large family.
reviews.title: Best trash canever

reviews.name: iTouchless Fully-Automatic Touchless 23-Gallon Trash Can NX, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText:
This is a pretty cool trash can. Just wave your hand over the top and it automatically opens and closes.
Very sanitary, too.
Only set back...runs on batteries or can be plugged into the wall but DOES NOT come with the wall plug. You must buy this item seperately.
reviews.title: Pac Man Trash Can

reviews.name: iTouchless Fully-Automatic Touchless 23-Gallon Trash Can NX, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: I have shopped for a large automatic trash can, and this one was the best deal I could find (and I looked for 3 years). This trash can does everything it claims, and looks great. The price was more than I wanted to pay, but I figured after wanting it for 3 years, and not finding a better deal anywhere else, I should just break down and get it. Finally, I don't have to change my trash twice a day.
reviews.title: Large and convenient...but expensive

reviews.name: iTouchless Fully-Automatic Touchless 23-Gallon Trash Can NX, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: I like this can, and it holds a lot but I don't like that it is not sealed around the bottom. I tryed to rinse it out because it had an odor and I had water all over the floor but overall is good can and very attractive.
reviews.title: Nice large can
